modulegroup.name: Email
modulegroup.description: Email provides modules for several types of web forms, e.g. contact forms, comment forms, and many more.

modules.module: This page module can either display a standard contact form or any form you can create with the form editor. Feedback can be stored in a database or sent to an email address.
Simple feedback form is the standard contact form.
Generates a mailto link that allows users to recommend a page to friends or family members.
Generates a mailto link that allows users to email you a page comment.
This form allows users to recommend pages to friends or family members. Used in combination with the "Page Link" module (package "Default/Base").
This form allows users to give you a comment on a page. Used in combination with the "Page Link" module (package "Default/Base").
Just like "Simple feedback form". This page module additionally stores submitted values in the database.
